casebody.data:
DOUGLAS
v.
EASLEY. No. 222P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of April 2005 by Plaintiff for Sentence Reduction Credits, Pursuant to G.S. 7A-245(A)(2), G.S. 15A-1355(d) (2001), G.S. 1-2:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
